boardgame.name: Expedition
Expedition: Abenteurer, Entdecker, Mythen
National Geographic Expedition
Terra-X
boardgame.description: Based on his earlier effort, Wildlife Adventure, Expedition is a game about moving three commonly held expeditions around the world in search of various archaeological sites. The board is a map of the world with many different branching paths, and players advance the expeditions by placing plastic arrows. When an expedition arrives at a location that matches one of your cards, you score that card. The first player to score all of his cards ends the game, and the highest total score takes the day._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplements_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wildlife Adventure_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented as_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Schatzsucher (children's version)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Expedition: Famous Explorers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The game is like new, but the box has a corner that was banged up and had to be taped - this happened when it was shipped to me. I have 3 different editions of this game, so this edition was only played a couple of times. It is the Queen Games edition with the SDJ label on the cover. The cards are like new, the trip tickets tablet is almost completely unused. I removed 11 coupons from the tablet, and the rest (over 60) are still attached and unused. The board is in perfect condition and the plastic arrows were counted and there are exactly 45 in each color. Comes from a smoke-free home.
